seg.source: München: Florian David Fitz völlig betrunken mit Ina Müller
seg.translation: Munich: Florian David Fitz completely drunk with Ina Müller
Munich: Florian David Fitz completely drunk with Ina Müller
Munich: Florian David Fitz completely drunk with Ina Müller

seg.source: So frisch und gutausehend kennen ihn seine Fans normalerweise: Florian David Fitz.
seg.translation: His fans normally know him to be so fresh and good looking: Florian David Fitz.
Florian David Fitz - a man normally seen by his fans as fresh and good looking.
His fans usually know him as fresh and handsome: Florian David Fitz.

seg.source: Da muss man schon zweimal hinschauen: Ja, das ist wirklich Florian David Fitz.
seg.translation: You have to look twice, though: Yes, that's really Florian David Fitz.
You have to take a second glance - yes, it really is Florian David Fitz.
You have to look twice: Yes, that really is Florian David Fitz.

seg.source: Der beliebte Schauspieler war in Hamburg - und erlebte eine wilde Nacht!
seg.translation: The popular actor was in Hamburg - and he had a wild night!
The famous actor was in Hamburg - and enjoyed a wild night!
The popular actor was in Hamburg - and had a wild night!

seg.source: Hamburg - Die vom NDR produzierte Talkshow "Inas Nacht" ist für feuchtfröhliche Gespräche an der Theke der Hamburger Hafenkneipe "Schellfischposten" bekannt.
seg.translation: Hamburg - The talk show “Inas Nacht” [Ina's Night] produced by NDR is known for its cheery conversations at the bar of the Hamburg port pub “Schellfischposten.”
Hamburg - The NDR-produced talkshow "Ina's Night" is known for its merry discussion at the bar of the Hamburg harbor pub "The Haddock Post".
Hamburg - The talk show "Inas Nacht," produced by NDR, is known for cheerful conversations at the bar of the Hamburg harbour pub "Schellfischposten."

seg.source: Moderatorin Ina Müller stößt mit ihrem Gästen auf manches Bier, manchen Wein oder auch hochprozentigere Getränke an, um die Stimmung und Zungen aufzulockern.
seg.translation: Moderator Ina Müller often cheers her guests with a beer, some wine or even stronger beverages to loosen up the mood and their tongues.
Presenter Ina Müller raises her glass to her guest - some with beer, some with wine, others with stronger drinks, to relax the mood and to loosen tongues.
Presenter Ina Müller toasts with her guests some beer, some wine or even high-percentage drinks in order to loosen up the mood and tongues.

seg.source: Nicht wenige Promis trinken sich auch für die obligatorischen Gesangseinlagen Mut an.
seg.translation: Quite a few celebs also need the liquid courage for the obligatory vocal number.
Quite a few celebrities have a dose of Dutch courage for the compulsory sing-a-longs.
Quite a few celebrities also drink themselves into the ground for the obligatory singing sessions.

seg.source: Am Freitag wurde eine weitere Folge der beliebten Talkshow aufgezeichnet.
seg.translation: Another episode of the popular talk show was recorded on Friday.
A further episode of the popular talkshow was recorded on Friday.
On Friday, another episode of the popular talk show was taped.

seg.source: Diesmal dabei: Der Schauspieler Florian David Fitz bekannt aus Filmen wie "Männerherzen", "Terror - Ihr Urteil" oder "Der geilste Tag".
seg.translation: This time: The actor Florian David Fitz known from films like "Männerherzen", "Terror - Ihr Urteil" or "Der geilste Tag".

The guest this time is actor Florian David Fitz, famous for his roles in films such as "Männerherzen" (Men's hearts), "Terror - Ihr Urteil" (Terror, or judgement") or "Der geilste Tag" (The best day".
This time around: The actor Florian David Fitz is known from films such as "Men's Hearts," "Terror - Your Judgment" and "The Horniest Day."

seg.source: Dem Münchner bekam der Ausflug in den hohen Norden aber gar nicht gut.
seg.translation: The trip didn’t do the actor any good, though.
However, the trip to the far North did not do the Munich native good at all.
But the trip to the far north did not go well for the Munich native.

seg.source: Am Samstag postete er ein Selfie - sein Gesicht ist darauf völlig zerknautscht, die Augen nur noch zwei kleine Schlitze.
seg.translation: On Saturday, he posted a selfie - his face completely crumpled, only two small slits for eyes.
On Saturday, he posted a selfie - in it, his face is really wrinkled and his eyes are two narrow slits.
On Saturday he posted a selfie - his face completely crumpled on it, his eyes just two small slits.

seg.source: Das Bett-Selfie zeigt einen völlig ausgelaugten Florian David Fitz.
seg.translation: The bed selfie showed a completely drained Florian David Fitz.
And a selfie on the bed shows a completely exhausted Florian David Fitz.
The bed selfie shows a completely exhausted Florian David Fitz.

seg.source: Doch er ist nicht krank, er hat nur einen mächtigen Kater.
seg.translation: But he is not ill, he only has quite a hangover.
But he is not ill - he just has an almighty hangover.
But he's not sick, he just has a powerful hangover.

seg.source: An seine Fans gerichtet postete er einige - wohl nicht ganz ernstgemeinte - Erkenntnisse, die er nun gewonnen hat: "Regel eins: geht NIE zu Inas Nacht.
seg.translation: Addressing his fans, he posted some - probably not entirely serious - insights he learnt: "Rule one: NEVER go to Inas Night.
For his fans, he posted - probably to be taken humorously - the things he had learned: "Rule No. 1: NEVER go on Ina's Night.
Addressing his fans, he posted some - probably not entirely serious - insights he has now gained: 'Rule one: NEVER go to Ina's night.

seg.source: Regel zwei: trinkt nie die schwarze Sau.
seg.translation: Rule two: Never drink "die schwarze Sau".
Rule No. 2.: Never drink black liqueur
Rule two: never drink the black sow.

seg.source: Und Spritz.
seg.translation: And Spritz.
Or spritz.
And spritz.

seg.source: Und die Runde Eierlikör, die Ina um halb drei schmeißt, lasst auch weg.
seg.translation: And also pass on Ina’s round of eggnog at half past two."
And the egg nog that Ina produced at half two in the morning - leave that alone too.
And leave out the round of eggnog, which Ina throws at half past three.

seg.source: Der Alkoholkonsum steht dem 43-Jährigen wahrlich ins Gesicht geschrieben.
seg.translation: The long night is really showing on the 43-year-olds’ face.
You can tell the amount of alcohol the 43 year-old drank on his face.
Alcohol consumption is written all over the 43-year-old's face.

seg.source: Seine Fans posteten gleich ein paar Tipps zur Bekämpfung der Nachwehen.
seg.translation: His fans posted a couple of tips for getting rid of a hangover.
His fans posted tips on dealing with the aftermath.
His fans immediately posted a few tips on how to combat the aftermath.

seg.source: Sie reichten von Instantbrühe, Fischbrötchen oder - vermutlich am zielführendsten - Kopfschmerztabletten.
seg.translation: They ranged from instant broth, fish sandwiches or - probably the most effective - painkillers.
These ranged from instant broth, fish rolls and - probably the most efficient - headache tablets.
They ranged from instant broth, fish rolls or - probably most purposefully - headache tablets.

seg.source: Andere amüsierten sich einfach über den Anblick des normalerweise attraktiven Kinostars.
seg.translation: Others simply enjoyed the sight of the normally attractive movie star.
Others just amused themselves with the appearance of the normally attractive film star.
Others were simply amused by the sight of the normally attractive movie star.

seg.source: Wie Ina Müller das nächtliche Saufgelage überstanden hat, ist bislang nicht bekannt.
seg.translation: We still don't know how Ina Müller survived the binge drinking at night.
It is currently unknown how Ina Müller coped with the aftermath of the previous night's drinking session.
It is not yet known how Ina Müller survived the night-time binge.

seg.source: Da sie den TV-Spaß an der Theke aber bereits seit 2007 moderiert, scheint die 53-Jährige deutlich erprobter zu sein...
seg.translation: Since she has hosted the wild TV fun at the bar since 2007, the 53-year-old seems to be much better prepared...
As she has been presenting the show since 2007, however, it's probably the case that the 53 year-old is much more used to it...
However, since she has been hosting the TV fun at the bar since 2007, the 53-year-old seems to be much more experienced...

seg.source: Auf ein Bier mit Ina Müller.
seg.translation: Out for a beer with Ina Müller.
A beer with Ina Müller.
For a beer with Ina Müller.
